item.title: Runescape Account Grabber
item.dc:creator: @belbn belbn
item.description:
@belbn wrote:

I have an old script written by xxlegitxx that actually logs into the runescape forums with whatever username and password you list and tells you if it works, anyway I dont really care about cracking them, just seeing how many I can get :D.

By the way, Zezima’s password is probably 983jdsjnIUN37HKBN34534DD and isnt able to be changed anyway without jagex approving it. Dont even try.

item.title: Runescape Account Grabber
item.dc:creator: @belbn belbn
item.description:
@belbn wrote:

Well I saw some guy on sythe buying a “large list of usernames” so I was inspired

Note: You may need to temporarily adjust max_execution_time in php.ini to make it run more than 30 seconds.
It is quite fast though, I already have 100KB file in just a few minutes.

<?php //@author Belbn for ($i=1; $i<50000000; $i+=21) {

$url = “http://hiscore.runescape.com/overall.ws?rank=$i&table=0&scroll=true&category_type=0”;
$useragent=“Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.1.1) Gecko/20061204 Firefox/2.0.0.1”;
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL,$url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, 1);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER,1);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $useragent);
$result = curl_exec($ch);

preg_match_all(’|user1=(.*?)"|si’,$result,$nameArray);

$open = fopen(‘usernames.txt’, “a”);
for ($n=0; $n<21; $n+=1) {
fwrite($open, $nameArray[1][$n] . “\n”);
}
}
?>

Edit (for fuck sakes):

Due to excessive use of the Hiscore system, your IP has been temporarily blocked

Please wait a few minutes and then try again.

If you are using an automated process to gather a large amount of data (e.g. for a fansite) then please use the page we have designed for this purpose: http://hiscore.runescape.com/index_lite.ws?player=YourUsername

An explanation of how to use this page can be found here.

I am a failure
I guess dont run it over 5 minutes at a time lol.

Read full topic
